content: पंजिका {@--1@} A perpetual or running commentary which explains and analyses every word; टीका निरंतरव्याख्या पंजिका पदनक्तिका. {@--2@} A journal, a book in which accounts of receipts and expenditure are entered. {@--3@} The record or register of human actions kept by Yama. (For other senses see पंजि above).
